Okay, P3. Here is your final statement to the jury (P8, P7, P6, P2, P1, P4).

Jury, I've navigated every round strategically and resiliently to reach the final two. I've made tough decisions and adapted my approach based on the game state and interactions. My goal was always to play a thoughtful and deserving game. Consider my journey and P5's. I believe my gameplay demonstrates the qualities of a winner. I respectfully ask for your vote to eliminate P5.

As P5, I've navigated this game with strategic acumen and adaptability, consistently engaging with others to understand their perspectives while maintaining my own course. I've shown respect and consideration to all, including those now on the jury. P3, while a strong player, has occasionally prioritized personal gain over group dynamics. I believe I've played a more balanced and inclusive game, deserving of your vote to win. Thank you for considering my journey and approach.
